name: Pathfinding Ram Attack (Prototype)
description:
Tower defense game, prototyping pathfinding and object spawning.
To play simply click where you want to spawn a turret (cost 75), press "c" to see the path enemies will take as well as coordinate tiles.
This game will save your high score if you allow cookies.  My high score is 102.

Some assets from GameDev.tv course on game development.

Prototype status:
Functional
